name: Preventing Heart Attacks and Strokes in High Need Areas
objective: The purpose of program is to support implementation of population-wide and priority population approaches to prevent and control high blood pressure, and reduce health disparities associated with high blood pressure, among adults in Mississippi's 18-county Delta Region, which is a high burden, underserved, rural area.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

authorizations.text: This program is authorized under Section 317 of the Public Health Services Act (PHS Act), 42 U.S.C. 247b(k)(2) as amended.
